name: Lunar Timepiece: Shadow Of Twelve / 十二刻度的月计时
name_original: Lunar Timepiece: Shadow Of Twelve / 十二刻度的月计时
description: "Lunar Timepiece: Shadow of Twelve" is a suspense game combined with text AVG. It contains of mysterious puzzles, progress of friendship and dozens of scene maps. Up to dozens of characters can choose to associate with. Here you can become a detective to discover truth of this resort, or while enjoying a leisurely vacation time go to take up with NPCs who have different characteristics and attributes.-- Are you ready?
